sentences.en: After that he applies the last component of his secret formula.
sentences.cn: 然后他使用秘密配方里的最后一种元素.

sentences.en: At a deeper lever, it has a sexist component.
sentences.cn: 在更深一层意义上, 它含有性别歧视的成分.

sentences.en: Blade and handle are the component parts of a knife.
sentences.cn: 刀身和刀柄是一把刀的组成部分.

sentences.en: companies that make electronic components for computer products
sentences.cn: 为计算机产品生产电子零件的公司

sentences.en: Each component is carefully checked before assembly.
sentences.cn: 每个零件在装配前都经过仔细检查.

sentences.en: Enriched uranium is a key component of a nuclear weapon.
sentences.cn: 浓缩铀是核武器的关键组成部分。

sentences.en: Gorbachev failed to keep the component parts of the Soviet Union together.
sentences.cn: 戈尔巴乔夫没能把苏联各成员国团结在一起。

sentences.en: Polish workers will now be making component parts for Boeing 757s.
sentences.cn: 现在波音757飞机的组成部件将由波兰工人制造。

sentences.en: Slang had been a principal component of his rattling.
sentences.cn: 他唠叨的主要是一些假语村言.

sentences.en: The apparatus thus described, however, records only the horizontal component of the wave movement.
sentences.cn: 然而, 仪器的如此描画只记录下波的运动的水平组成部分, 但是事实上波的运动要复杂得多(指不易解释).

sentences.en: The component having a more localized source is referred to as residual.
sentences.cn: 由局部源产生的分量称为区域异常.

sentences.en: The component we collapsed had at least two vertices.
sentences.cn: 我们毁掉的分支至少有两个顶点.

sentences.en: The menu is all-important. Every component of every meal should create contrasts.
sentences.cn: 饭菜的安排至关重要。每一顿饭的每一道菜都应该有所不同。

sentences.en: They were automotive component suppliers to motor manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 他们为汽车制造商供应汽车零件。

sentences.en: This figure includes the liquid component but excludes the intercellular cement.
sentences.cn: 这个数值包括类脂物成份在内,但不包括细胞间粒接剂.

sentences.en: Wallerstein's work can be separated into three main component themes.
sentences.cn: 沃勒斯坦的作品可以细分成3个主要的主题。

phrases.tran_cn: 活性组分；有效元件；作用分量
分量分析；[化]组分分析；组成成分分析
功能组成部分，功能部件
主要组成部份；关键组分
结构零件；结构组件；结构部件

trans.tran_en: the component parts of something are the parts that it consists of
one of several parts that together make up a whole machine, system etc
